titles.title: Making Education Affordable and Accessible Act of 2023
Making Education Affordable and Accessible Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to make college affordable and accessible by expanding access to dual or concurrent enrollment programs and early college high school programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary:
Making Education Affordable and Accessible Act of 2023
This bill reauthorizes through FY2029 and revises the Fund for the Improvement of Postsecondary Education (FIPSE) program.
The bill also authorizes new grants under the FIPSE program. Specifically, the Department of Education may award grants to institutions of higher education for dual or concurrent enrollment programs or early college high school programs that allow high school students to earn postsecondary credits.
